Package hecc_up

Class FolderOutputter

java.lang.Object
hecc_up.FolderOutputter
public class FolderOutputter extends Object
This class is responsible for outputting the HECCIN' Game into the folder it's supposed to be output into.

  • Constructor Details

    • FolderOutputter

      public FolderOutputter​(Path outPath) throws SecurityException, IOException
      This is the FolderOutputter constructor
      Parameters:
      outPath - filepath for the output folder
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if the output folder could not be made
      IOException - if the output folder could not be made

  • Method Details

    • outputTheGameWithMetadata

      public void outputTheGameWithMetadata​(List<String> heccedData, FolderOutputterMetadataInterface metadata) throws SecurityException, IOException
      This outputs the HECCIN Game, using the passed heccedData and the passed Metadata object
      Parameters:
      heccedData - the hecced data to be put in hecced.js
      metadata - the metadata object to be used in a few places (via the outputterMetadata interface)
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if there's a security problem preventing stuff from being output
      IOException - if there's another input/output problem

    • writeTheFile

      private void writeTheFile​(Path p, List<String> dataToWrite) throws SecurityException, IOException
      This is a generic method for writing a Path (p)
      Parameters:
      p - the Path (which has been created) to be written to
      dataToWrite - all the data to be written to path p
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if there's a security problem preventing this from working
      IOException - if there's another IO problem

    • writeTheFile

      private void writeTheFile​(Path p, String s) throws SecurityException, IOException
      This is a generic method for writing a string to a file designated by a Path (p)
      Parameters:
      p - the Path to the file (which has been created) to be written to
      s - a string with all the data to be written to path p
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if there's a security problem preventing this from working
      IOException - if there's another IO problem

    • writeIndexButWithMetadata

      private void writeIndexButWithMetadata​(FolderOutputterMetadataInterface metadata, Path indexPath) throws SecurityException, IOException
      This writes the index.html file, and uses the given Metadata object to help out
      Parameters:
      metadata - the metadata object that data is being obtained from
      indexPath - the path for the file being read.
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if there's a security problem preventing the file from being made
      IOException - if there's another IO problem

    • writeIFictionFile

      private void writeIFictionFile​(FolderOutputterMetadataInterface metadata, Path thePath) throws SecurityException, IOException
      This writes the metadata.iFiction file, using data held in the metadata object
      Parameters:
      metadata - the metadata object that data is being obtained from
      thePath - the path for the iFiction file
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if there's a security problem preventing the file from being made
      IOException - if there's another IO problem
